alert.note: Alert for Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Central Ventura County Valleys; Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Susana Mountains; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Southern Ventura County Mountains; Western San Fernando Valley; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued October 27 at 6:34AM PDT until October 30 at 2:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley, Central Ventura County Valleys, Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area, Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area, Calabasas and Agoura Hills, Western San Fernando Valley, Southeastern Ventura County Valleys, Santa Susana Mountains and Southern Ventura County Mountains. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...While wind gusts are generally expected to peak between 50 and 55 mph, there is a moderate risk for gusts to exceed 60 mph. That risk is the basis for this High Wind Watch.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
